actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn Sine Die.
The House convened, returning from a recess continuing the legislative day of January 3.
The Speaker announced that the House do now recess. The next meeting is subject to the call of the Chair.
The House received a communication from Representative Gonzalez-Colon wherein she resigns as a member of the House of Representatives effective at 11:59 p.m. on January 1, 2025.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the resignation of the gentleman from North Carolina, Mr. Jackson, the whole number of the House is 429.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Steve Womack to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
